it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.changes

Class DamageGameChange

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.model.game.changes.DamageGameChange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameChange

    public class DamageGameChange
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameChange
    GameChanges that deals damage from a player to another player in the specified amount.

    • Constructor Summary

      Builds a new DamageGameChange bound to the given parameters.

      Builds a new DamageGameChange bound to the given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Reverts the changes made by this game change to the given Game object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DamageGameChange

        public DamageGameChange(Player attacker,
                        Player attacked,
                        int dmgAmt,
                        int mrkAmt)
        Builds a new DamageGameChange bound to the given parameters. The built GameChange will attempt to realize marks by default.
        Parameters:
        attacker - player dealing damage
        attacked - player taking damage
        dmgAmt - amount of damage dealt
        mrkAmt - amount of mark dealt

      • DamageGameChange

        public DamageGameChange(Player attacker,
                        Player attacked,
                        int dmgAmt,
                        int mrkAmt,
                        boolean canRealizeMarks)
        Builds a new DamageGameChange bound to the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        attacker - player dealing damage
        attacked - player taking damage
        dmgAmt - amount of damage dealt
        mrkAmt - amount of mark dealt
        canRealizeMarks - whether the damages dealt within this GameChange should attempt to realize marks.
